reviewText: My granddaughter loves the Land before time movies. We watch them together and it's great spending time with her.
Only reason I am giving it three stars is because when you order it does not tell you its # 10 and 11 and I already had #10.
This was a gift for my god son He is a BIG Land Before Time fan. He loves dinosaur's. Soon I will be looking for more. Thanks
Love all the series now as much as 25 yrs ago. My great granddaughter watches the same ones over and over
I love this series, I grew up on it. I absolutely adore these movies I bought them all. Great for kids
my child loves land before time, little foot and all the other characters are good stories and she loves them all
Purchased for my grandson who really enjoyed the double feature movies on one disc.  Both movies are on one side only.  Would have been better if there were 2 separate discs, but it turned out OK.

My three grandsons, ages 3, 9, and 12, all boys, have all learned a lot from the entire collection of Land Before Time.  I was missing one, must have gotten lost, so I ordered another one. Land Before Time is not only great for children, it is good for adult viewing; there is always 'thought' behind it and I have re-visited many, many things my mother use to tell me to make me a better person. There is always a learning theme with each one. I have the entire collection, both is VHS and DVDs.

I love DVDs from Amazon.com.  Unless absolutely necessary, I only by those from Amazon.com, not their other sellers. For some reason, every time I buy from another Amazon vendor, I have problems.  I would rather pay a little more for the same item, then have issues later.  I love Amazon.  They take pride in packing the item and have great follow-through which is good for customer relations.

My 6.5-year-old grandson just LOVES all of the Land Before Time series.  He will watch them over and over and over and seems to NEVER get tired of them. They really seem to have made a huge impression upon him and his new friends from next door to us have all of the DVDs.  This is what I would write on the other two as well. Thank you.
My grandsons love this movie. My boys just love watching the Land before times movies.

My 5 year old nephew absolutely loves this series of movies and episodes.  He watches them over and over again.  Each movie and episode has a very positive message.  Issues such as sharing, friendship, lying, and family are covered in an entertaining way.  Your kids will love these and you will love them for their positive messages.
Awesome deal! My son loves dinosaurs!! We got a 2 movies (1dvd) and in really cool packaging.
My son loves dinosaurs. And what is better than a classic dinosaur movie? Nothing!!! It keeps him entertained.
land before time, YES

kids love it, they don't like the "long neck migration" as much, a bit more scary.  they like the 2nd movie better, tiny little-foots.  price is great and comes in the little carry case.  wish all movies come with this carry case.

My grandson loves to watch these Land Before Time movies when he comes to visit.  I enjoy them too.  I want this review to include all the other Land Before Movies as I bought all of them and do not want to repeat this review 18 times.
great product and service
My Kids happen to love it....they love dinosaurs so this is right up their alley.
Love the double feature. . . 2 movies for the price of one.  Love that Amazon carries all the Land Before Time movies and at great prices! DVD works great.
It was a huge hit with my kids.
I enjoyed watching these movies with my daughter we also enjoyed the series of other.  Little foot is such an adorable character.
